name: Idea
description: Represents an idea posted to the Ideas application.
summary:
The `{Idea}` object in Salesforce is designed to manage and track ideas within a community or organization. It contains various attributes that facilitate the creation, modification, and categorization of ideas, as well as user interaction and voting.

Key attributes include:

- **Id (id)**: A unique identifier for each idea.
- **IsDeleted (boolean)**: Indicates whether the idea has been deleted.
- **Title (string)**: The title of the idea.
- **RecordTypeId (reference)**: References the type of record.
- **CreatedDate (datetime)**: Timestamp of when the idea was created.
- **CreatedById (reference)**: References the user who created the idea.
- **LastModifiedDate (datetime)**: Timestamp of the last modification.
- **LastModifiedById (reference)**: References the user who last modified the idea.
- **SystemModstamp (datetime)**: System-generated timestamp for tracking changes.
- **LastViewedDate (datetime)**: The last time the idea was viewed.
- **LastReferencedDate (datetime)**: The last time the idea was referenced.
- **CommunityId (reference)**: References the community where the idea is posted.
- **Body (textarea)**: The detailed description or body of the idea.
- **NumComments (int)**: The number of comments on the idea.
- **VoteScore (double)**: The score based on user votes.
- **VoteTotal (double)**: The total number of votes.
- **Categories (multipicklist)**: Categories assigned to the idea.
- **Status (picklist)**: The current status of the idea (e.g., new, under review).
- **LastCommentDate (datetime)**: Timestamp of the last comment.
- **LastCommentId (reference)**: References the last comment made on the idea.
- **ParentIdeaId (reference)**: References a parent idea if this idea is a sub-idea.
- **IsHtml (boolean)**: Indicates if the idea body contains HTML.
- **IsMerged (boolean)**: Indicates if the idea has been merged with another idea.
- **CreatorFullPhotoUrl (string)**: URL to the full-size photo of the idea's creator.
- **CreatorSmallPhotoUrl (string)**: URL to the small-size photo of the idea's creator.
- **CreatorName (string)**: The name of the idea's creator.

These attributes collectively support the effective management of ideas, enabling users to propose, discuss, vote on, and track the status of ideas within the Salesforce platform.
label: Idea
